titleInfo.title: Ricky Skaggs Pickin' Party at Wolftrap (1991)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Three color window card (black and red on yellow) announcing The Ricky Skaggs Pickin' Party, a bluegrass spectacular, starring Ricky Skaggs and featuring Bill Monroe and The Bluegrass Boys, Ralph Stanley and The Clinch Mountain Boys, Alison Krauss and Union Station, Tony Rice Unit, and a reunion performance by The New South with J. D. Crowe, Tony Rice, Jerry Douglas, and Ricky Skaggs at Wolf Trap on August 25. Poster features a metal photoplate of a chicken and the phrase, "something to crow about!"

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
